scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Reaper vs. Sheep -Ouen ver.-'.

subtitles.original: わためのラップが最高だから
subtitles.english: Because Watame's rap is the best

subtitles.original: 麻婆豆腐も食べたいし
subtitles.english: I want to eat Mapo Tofu too

subtitles.original: わための勝ちってことでいいかな？
subtitles.english: So it's okay to say Watame wins?

subtitles.original: YEAH!
subtitles.english: YEAH!

subtitles.original: HEY! HEY! HEY!
subtitles.english: HEY! HEY! HEY!

subtitles.original: Hands up!
subtitles.english: Hands up!

subtitles.original: Put your hands up, and YEAH!
subtitles.english: Put your hands up, and YEAH!

subtitles.original: 楽しんでますかー！
subtitles.english: Are you having fun?!

subtitles.original: Alright, let's go!
subtitles.english: Alright, let's go!

subtitles.original: Bring it in everybody!
subtitles.english: Bring it in everybody!

subtitles.original: Okay, time to get serious.
subtitles.english: Okay, time to get serious.

subtitles.original: When playing it's time to get slain
subtitles.english: When playing it's time to get slain

subtitles.english: all praise and I raise it to debt

subtitles.english: betray me, flame me, open and live

subtitles.english: maybe death we be low-key nobody best

subtitles.english: tryna mess with the sheep but she makes a cut

subtitles.original: she'll be cut cute deep more than once
subtitles.english: she'll be cut cute deep more than once

subtitles.original: she push your buttons so honestly
subtitles.english: she push your buttons so honestly

subtitles.original: Watame ought to be taking the lead!
subtitles.english: Watame ought to be taking the lead!

subtitles.original: 本気のためラップかまします まずは何がいい？
subtitles.english: Dropping a serious rap, what should I start with?

subtitles.original: どんどん集まってくる視線の先は巻きたい
subtitles.english: The focus of the gathering eyes is on me

subtitles.original: 変態全開させ先輩 限界宴会いくぜ！
subtitles.english: Letting my perversion out, Senpai, let's go to the limit!

subtitles.original: 悩んで悩んでもいいんだぜ
subtitles.english: It's okay to worry and worry

subtitles.original: 別に悪くないよね
subtitles.english: It's not bad at all, is it?

subtitles.original: 迷って迷っても頑張れ
subtitles.english: Even if you're lost, do your best

subtitles.original: って言わなくちゃないよね
subtitles.english: That's what I have to say

subtitles.original: The Reaper and Sheep off the best for you
subtitles.english: The Reaper and Sheep off the best for you

subtitles.original: 明日も明後日もそばに居よ
subtitles.english: I'll be by your side tomorrow and the next day

subtitles.original: 笑って笑ってもいいんだぜ
subtitles.english: It's okay to laugh and laugh

subtitles.original: 笑われるまで泣いたれ
subtitles.english: Cry until you get laughed at

subtitles.original: One more time! One more time!
subtitles.english: One more time! One more time!

subtitles.original: No no no...
subtitles.english: No no no...

subtitles.original: わため先輩、もう終わりですよ。
subtitles.english: Watame-senpai, it's over now.

subtitles.original: えー！まだまだラップし足りないよ！
subtitles.english: Ehh! I haven't rapped enough yet!

subtitles.original: Round 2 いけるよね？
subtitles.english: We can do Round 2, right?

subtitles.original: 死神だけど... dammit...
subtitles.english: I'm a Reaper but... dammit...

subtitles.original: はーい！いえーい！
subtitles.english: Haii! Yay!

subtitles.original: すごかったね！ありがとうみんな！
subtitles.english: That was amazing! Thanks everyone!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったー！カリちゃん来てくれてありがとー！
subtitles.english: That was fun! Thanks for coming, Calli-chan!

subtitles.original: はー、毎回楽しいね、わため先輩。
subtitles.english: Ah, it's fun every time, Watame-senpai.

subtitles.original: ね！
subtitles.english: Right!

subtitles.original: 本当に誘ってくれて、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for inviting me.

subtitles.original: こちらこそ！
subtitles.english: Likewise!

subtitles.original: カリちゃんのソロライブの時も、呼んでくれてありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Thank you for inviting me to your solo live too.

subtitles.original: もちろんです。
subtitles.english: Of course.

subtitles.original: いつでもね、呼んでくださいね。
subtitles.english: Please invite me anytime, okay?

subtitles.original: そして素敵な3周年、おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: And congratulations on a wonderful three years!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Thank you! I'm happy!

subtitles.original: うわー、めっちゃめっちゃ素晴らしい先輩、
subtitles.english: Wow, you're a really amazing senior,

subtitles.original: 本当に憧れな人です、わため先輩。
subtitles.english: someone I truly admire, Watame-senpai.

subtitles.original: 大好き。
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: えー！照れるー。
subtitles.english: Ehh! I'm blushing.

subtitles.original: わためも大好き！嬉しい、あはっ。
subtitles.english: I love you too! I'm happy, haha.

subtitles.original: 嬉しい... はぁ、ドキドキしてる。
subtitles.english: I'm happy... Ah, my heart is pounding.

subtitles.original: I love you.
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: I love you too, senpai!
subtitles.english: I love you too, Calliope-senpai!

subtitles.original: いつもうわーって頑張ってるね、先輩。
subtitles.english: You're always working so hard, senpai.

subtitles.original: そんなことない、カリちゃんたって。
subtitles.english: Not at all, you too Calli-chan.

subtitles.original: いや、本当に何かすごいリスペクトしてるよ。
subtitles.english: No, I really respect you a lot.

subtitles.original: こちらこそ、Very Busy Reaperだ。
subtitles.english: Likewise, Very Busy Reaper.

subtitles.original: No, Very Busy Sheep.
subtitles.english: No, Very Busy Sheep.

subtitles.original: これからもね、ラップでも歌でも頑張りましょう。
subtitles.english: Let's keep doing our best in rap and singing.

subtitles.original: 頑張りましょう！そうだね、sheep rapper。
subtitles.english: Let's do our best! That's right, sheep rapper.

subtitles.original: そう、でも次回ね、負けないよ。
subtitles.english: Yes, but next time, I won't lose.

subtitles.original: いえ、次も勝ちます！勝ちますね、次も。
subtitles.english: No, I'll win next time too! I'll win next time as well.

subtitles.original: No, 勝ちますよ！
subtitles.english: No, I'll win!

subtitles.original: 絶対勝つ！
subtitles.english: I'll definitely win!

subtitles.original: やだね！え、でもじゃあ次も歌ってくれるってこと？
subtitles.english: No way! Oh, but does that mean you'll sing with me next time too?

subtitles.original: Round 2! Round 2! 2, 2, 2!
subtitles.english: Round 2! Round 2! 2, 2, 2!

subtitles.original: もうちょっと何かスタミナトレーニングしなきゃいけない。
subtitles.english: I need to do a bit more stamina training.

subtitles.original: あは、Very Busy Reaperだね。
subtitles.english: Haha, I'm a Very Busy Reaper.

subtitles.original: そうだね。運動したいよ。頑張ります、先輩。
subtitles.english: That's right. I want to exercise. I'll do my best, Calliope-senpai.

subtitles.original: わかった。また次一緒に歌おう。
subtitles.english: Understood. Let's sing together again next time.

subtitles.original: もちろんです。
subtitles.english: Of course.

subtitles.original: あ、呼んでくださいね、いつでも。
subtitles.english: Ah, please invite me anytime.

subtitles.original: ありがとうだよ。嬉しい。はーい、じゃあ頑張ってね。
subtitles.english: Thank you. I'm happy. Okay, keep doing your best.

subtitles.original: 頑張る！はーい、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: I will! Yes, thank you!

subtitles.original: ありがとう本当にみんな！See you!
subtitles.english: Thank you so much everyone! See you!
